en: The checkpoint has transformed into a military outpost. Elite guards in black uniforms patrol with weapons displayed.
I am Chief Security Officer Yukon, dispatched from the capital by Prime Minister Idaho.
Intelligence indicates a [pulse freq=2][color=YELLOW]terrorist attack is imminent[/color][/pulse]. The "resistance" plans to infiltrate tomorrow.
All officers will submit to [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=DARK_ORANGE]loyalty screening[/color][/wave]. Suspicious behavior means detention and [color=DARK_VIOLET]processing[/color].
[tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=RED]Full cooperation[/color][/tornado] with Security is mandatory. My reports on each of you have been provided to the Chief.
Russet's gaze lingers on you uncomfortably before moving on.
This is the [color=DARK_ORANGE]IdentityScan 5000[/color]. It analyzes biometrics to detect infiltrators and sympathizers.
Anyone triggering the scanner will face [color=CRIMSON]enhanced interrogation[/color]. Use it without exception.
Have you seen Sasha? She didn't report for roll call. Last night, [color=CRIMSON]security forces entered her quarters[/color].
They're saying she was part of the [pulse freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]resistance[/color][/pulse].
"We shouldn't be talking about this. It's dangerous."
"I'm worried about her too. This isn't right."
You're right. But watch yourself. They're looking for connections to her.
So you were close? Be careful. They might be watching you too.
The officer slips you a note: "[color=YELLOW]Clean your station of anything suspicious.[/color]"
You've been at this checkpoint for quite some time. Interesting performance record.
You were seen frequently with Officer Sasha, now under investigation for [wave amp=20 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]treason[/color][/wave].
The chief leans forward. Is there anything you'd like to tell me about her activities?
"Sasha and I were just colleagues. I know nothing about her outside work."
"I was gathering evidence on her suspicious activities to report later."
Multiple witnesses say otherwise. Without concrete evidence though, I can't detain you. [color=YELLOW]Yet.[/color]
You'll be under [color=CRIMSON]close observation[/color]. One misstep, and you'll [color=DARK_VIOLET]join Sasha[/color].
How convenient. And yet you filed no reports until now.
You'll provide a complete statement. If your information proves valuable, perhaps we'll overlook your delayed reporting.
I'll be [color=CRIMSON]monitoring your work[/color] today. Every traveler must be identity-scanned. [color=RED]No exceptions[/color].
Sasha has been taken. The resistance plan is [color=CRIMSON]compromised[/color]. With security on high alert, their chances seem hopeless.
